newsitem.title: USA: Bear Stearns hires equity cap markets exec.
newsitem.headline: Bear Stearns hires equity cap markets exec.

text.p: Bear Stearns Cos Inc said Thursday it named Gregory Rider senior managing director in the firm's equity capital markets group.
Bear Stearns said Rider will head the firm's international equity capital markets effort, a new position, and report to Victor Cohn, a senior managing director.
The firm said Rider was previously director of equity capital markets for Latin America at Merrill Lynch and Co Inc.
